data.name: Betaverse
data.detailed_description:
Betaverse is a rather unique (in a way you wish didn't exist) digital experience, a network of 3D virtual worlds created by Microtaur's troubled imagination. Play free with your friends and change the world around you in this not-so-intelligent indie MMO sandbox.

Features


  • üó∫Ô∏è Explore the world and interact with other players connected to the single server.
  • üî® Claim a piece of terrain and customize it with flexible building tools.
  • üó°Ô∏è Participate in various PVP tournaments multiple designated arenas.
  • üëñ Obtain swaggy stuff to stand out from the crowd.

data.short_description: Betaverse is a rather unique (in a way you wish didn't exist) digital experience, a network of 3D virtual worlds created by Microtaur's troubled imagination. Play free with your friends and change the world around you in this not-so-intelligent indie MMO sandbox.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series GPU or newer

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: bad language, sexual humor, non-realistic depictions of nudity.
